newsitem.title: UK: British Steel in talks to sell forgings unit.
newsitem.headline: British Steel in talks to sell forgings unit.

text.p: Steel manufacturer British Steel Plc on Friday said it had entered into exploratory discussions with a small number of potential purchasers of its forgings business.

British Steel Forgings (BSF) has an annual turnover of around 150 million stg and is the UK market leader in closed die forging, with around 50 percent of UK forgings capacity, the company said in a statement.

BSF supplies a wide range of forgings, predominantly to the automotive industry, and is an important supplier to the aerospace and industrial gas cylinders sector. It is also a major customer for British Steel Engineering Steels, the company said.
Discussions are at an early stage and a further announcement will be made in due course, the company said.
